% example LaTeX code to use psgo_emitter-generated files
% save the problem files in problems/ subdirectory 

\documentclass[paper=a5,BCOR=1in]{scrbook}
\usepackage{psgo}

\newcounter{ProblemNumber}

\newcommand\solution[1]{%
  \refstepcounter{ProblemNumber}
  \foreach \j in {1, 2, ..., 9} {%
    \edef\SolutionName{problems/problem-#1-sol-\j}%
    \IfFileExists{\SolutionName}{%
      \begin{minipage}[b]{0.49\textwidth}
        \input{\SolutionName}\quad%
        \center{\textbf{\theProblemNumber.} {solution \j.}}%
      \end{minipage}%
      \bigskip
    }
  }
}

\setgounit{0.4cm}

\begin{document}
\setlength{\parindent}{0pt}

\foreach \i in {1, 2, ..., 999} {%
  \edef\FileName{problems/problem-\i}%
  \IfFileExists{\FileName}{%
    \solution{\i}
  }
}

\end{document}
